Description:
Light, Bright and Spacious!!!
Situated within walking distance of the shopping centre, bus stop and highly regarded Primary School, this beautifully presented home has been lovingly updated to provide a modern, functional home that offers versatility for the whole family. The large living room has gas heater and split system heating and cooling and adjoins the meals and kitchen that offers an 800mm stainless steel stove, Miele dishwasher, glass splash back, plenty of bench space and loads of cupboards. There are four bedrooms with the second bedroom and third bedroom having access to the balcony and the fourth can serve as a work from home office or second living area if required. Special features include polished timber floors, evaporative cooling, fresh modern colour scheme and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through. Both bathrooms have been renovated ensuring there is not a cent to spend. There is a bungalow that would make an ideal teenagers pad, dependant relative accommodation or is a great space for work from home business, subject to council approval. Outdoors there is a manicured yard, off street parking, carport and a shed that would be perfect as a ‘man cave’. With everything at your fingertips you will be able to leave the car at home and put the savings towards your wonderful new property.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 28 Belgrave Gembrook, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare 1 1/3 Acre Block with Filtered Views!
On offer is a private 1.3 acres with a mix of cleared land & natural bush & filtered mountain views featuring a quaint 1950s 2 bedroom cottage & substantial shed. The cottage has 2 good sized bedrooms with robes, a small living room/kitchen with wood fire & gas stove & a combined laundry/bathroom. The home also has a gas heater & there is mains gas connected & mains water available, although the cottage is currently supplied by a large tank & the phone & power are connected. Add to this a double, lock up garage, made driveway, a shack that the original owners used as weekend accommodation whilst building the cottage, the ‘out house’ & all fully fenced, perfect for your furry family or children alike. The north facing block makes it ideal to sit on the verandah & watch the world go by. The options are many – make it your own hideaway in the Hills, use it as a weekender & let the kids explore the bush & track the wallabies, live in it while you build your dream home (STCA) or over build & extend to suit your needs. Minutes from Cockatoo & Emerald & soon to be bordered by new quality homes this property is a rare gem for the taking!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers or Investors!
PRIVATE LANEWAY ACCESS VIA DORCHESTER ROAD
A RARE OPPORTUNITY AT THIS PRICE TO SECURE A THREE BEDROOM, TWO BATHROOM HOME! Make sure you inspect this great property as soon as you can to avoid disappointment. The home is situated on a quarter acre block with easy access to Pakenham and walking distance to Cockatoo Township with its shops, schools, sporting grounds and public transport. Featuring 3 bedrooms, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite, the home is a typical split level, character Hills home with the Master and lounge on the lower level and the dining, further 2 bedrooms, family bathroom and kitchen on the top level. The spacious kitchen has ample storage and as new 900mm stainless cooktop and dishwasher. For heating and cooling you have a split system, cosy wood heater in the lounge whilst the whole home is heated with mains gas ducted heating for the ultimate in comfort. Entertaining outdoors is covered with a fabulous entertaining deck with lovely tree vista beyond. Add to this cute studio/storage room with power and a double carport and you have the perfect first home or investment property.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
What a Little Ripper!
First home owners and investors will be lining up for this great property, well located; close to the local school and shops and situated on a sealed road and offering plenty of parking for family & friends. The home features all the comforts enabling you to just move in & relax, including 3 good sized bedrooms, a sunny lounge room with fantastic wood heater and an open plan kitchen and dining area. The kitchen has been updated & features a new stove and dishwasher and it leads out to the large, undercover entertaining deck which overlooks the lovely sun filed back yard which is fully fenced for the safety of the little ones & fury friends. Some of the features include a new mains gas ducted heating system for convenience, lovely warm timber floors, new double blinds and ceiling fans. The back yard also has a shed/workshop with concrete floor and power as well as access for parking the caravan, trailer etc; perfect for the tradie. This property is a great buy and in this price range will sell quickly so don’t miss out; book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
A Piece of Country Life Close to Town
Unseen from the street, this 3 bedroom Alpine style home on over 2 acres sits on top of the world. As you enter the fenced property, with native and deciduous trees lining the driveway, you are greeted by delightful views across the valley.
A large double garage (9.3m x 6m approx.) can house the cars for you. From here, make your way up the stone stairway, or follow the sweeping driveway right up to the house, past the pony paddock for your four legged friends, and a sunny vegetable patch.
You’re welcomed by a covered entrance deck where native birds gather and confer. Through the front door, the open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area have a warm, inviting feel. Upstairs, we find two bedrooms with cathedral ceilings and exposed beams. The main bedroom opens onto a balcony where you can further enjoy the beautiful views. The second bedroom looks out over the garden towards the cubby house, and the third bedroom downstairs is perfect for the younger person of the family.
The kitchen and bathroom are in excellent condition. A clever European-style laundry within the bathroom comes with whitegoods included.
Heating is provided by a wood heater as well as a split system.
The back garden is level, with a cubby house and a garden shed - perfect play and work space for the family.
Be quick to see this beautiful secluded home with easy access to town and amenities.
Insights: 16 Belgrave Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
WHO SAID YOU COULDN’T GET INTO THE PROPERTY MARKET?
This split level cedar weatherboard home offers the perfect ‘Hills’ lifestyle. The home offers 3 bedrooms, 3 light filled living areas, a modern hostess kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. The home has all the extras you could ask for with polished timber floors, gas ducted heating, solar panels and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through. Two large decked entertaining areas that are a great place to sit back & enjoy the fresh country air. Outside you will find a useable 1/4 acre (approx.) with plenty of room for your four legged friends & kids to play. If you are looking for a quality home in the hills then look no further. Call today to inspect!

Description:
Charming Home, Perfect for the 1st Home Buyer!
Located close to the township of Cockatoo this delightful home is situated on a 1/3 of an acre with elevated outlook and set back off the road for privacy. Recently updated the home is ‘move in’ ready and features beautiful polished floorboards, painted dado panelling and new carpets. The home features open plan living with country style kitchen and spacious dining and lounge room which has French doors opening to the wrap around deck, perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing in the sunshine. This home features 3 bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with separate toilet. The comfortable Master bedroom has built in robes and French doors that open out to the balcony. You’ll be kept cosy in the cooler months with convenient gas ducted heating throughout. The large front garden has so much potential featuring flowering feature trees as well as palm trees and your own private flowing creek. Add to this a double lock up garage including workshop space with concrete floor and power; you also have a further shed in the rear yard with concrete floor suitable for storage. This charming home in such an affordable price range is a must see.

Description:
"Riverview"
Offered for sale for the first time in over 20 years is this much loved home situated a short distance to the thriving Hills Town of Cockatoo and all the amenities it has to offer such as schools, shops, restaurants, sporting grounds and public transport. The property consists of a 1920’s cottage which has been updated over the years to provide comfort and space for the growing family and is nestled on almost an acre of land with stunning outlook of majestic gum trees. The home consists of 3 bedrooms with built in robes, huge family room, dining room and a bar or sunroom. The spacious country kitchen has warm timber cabinetry, leadlight cupboard doors, as new oven with gas cooktop, stainless dishwasher, breakfast room and huge walk in pantry. In keeping with the country theme is the family bathroom with traditional claw foot bath as well as a modern element; the split system to keep you warm on these chilly mornings. Indoor features include original floorboards; ambient wood heater as well as gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling or year round comfort. Outside you have dual access; handy for parking oversized vehicles, a double lock up garage with concrete floor and three phase power, a cute cabin/studio with power and a garden shed. The garden has flowering shrubs and new retaining walls and pathways ensuring gardening is always a pleasure; you even have a pony paddock or just a really large lawn space for playing, a delightful element for the young ones in the family. Another important feature is that the home has been recently restumped, an important factor when buying an older home. With so few properties on the market in this affordable price range, you cannot afford to let this slip by, book your private inspection today and realise your dreams.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards 0400 100 155

Description:
Magnificent Residence on Just Over ½ Acre!
You’re going to love this beautifully presented home that offers space, style and comfort for the discerning buyer. This home features 3 generously sized bedrooms and study area, the large Master has plenty of robes and a light filled ensuite with vanity, shower and toilet. The home features spacious open plan living with the modern kitchen overlooking the meals and lounge area. The avid cook will appreciate the large kitchen with stone benches, gas cooktop and electric oven, the generous walk in pantry and ample storage space. The living area features stunning Tassie Oak timber floors, downlights and large Low E glass windows which allow views of the surrounding country garden. You will be kept warm and comfortable in the cooler months with gas ducted heating and a cosy wood heater. Double glass doors from the meals area lead out to a gorgeous covered patio and entertaining area with private outlook of the surrounding garden.
The double lock up garage has the convenience of internal access into the house and a separate single lock up garage includes a heater, toilet and basin making it ideal to use as a workshop, studio or teenager retreat. Another shed on this well-kept property offers ample storage for garden items or equipment. This unique home is definitely a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
COUNTRY CHARM ON 1 ACRE
A true country home and as pretty as a picture, here is all the character and charm you could want featuring a wrap around veranda that leads to a large deck where you will be able to enjoy a relaxed barbeque with family and friends while you watch the goings on in the in-ground salt chlorinated, solar heated pool. The home displays all of the hallmarks of a timeless era including polished floor boards, high ceilings, wide skirting, ornate plasterwork and corbelled archways together with the modern convenience of ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and reverse cycle split system making for an atmospheric and comfortable lifestyle. The formal lounge has intergrated speakers and is currently used as a theatre/media room whilst open plan living is enjoyed in the family/meals area that adjoins the timber kitchen which boasts updated appliances including Bosch dishwasher. The master bedroom is of grand proportions easily accommodating a king sized bed and is serviced by a full ensuite and walk in robe. Outdoors the 4047m2 provides ample room for romping around, an abundance of fruit trees and a workshop under the home that has provision for three phase power. Situated on a made road with all services connected and walking distance to shops, bus stop and our highly ranked primary school, this is what Hills living is all about.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Ready to Move in with Room to Improve!
Located on a fully fenced quarter acre walking distance to the heart of Cockatoo is this low maintenance hardiplank home that offers privacy & a relaxing outlook over the natural bush land reserve at the rear. The home features 3 bedrooms, or 2 with a study leading out to the deck, or maybe even make it a second living area. The open plan kitchen has ample storage and a stainless freestanding oven with gas cooktop. The home has a cosy wood fire in the lounge room whilst mains gas ducted heating & evaporative cooling ensure comfort & convenience whatever the season. Add to this a carport, single lock up garage, a heated outdoor spa in the entertaining area & your own fruit trees to nurture. At this price you can move in, stop paying rent & take your time to make it your own. Don't hesitate, as properties in this price range do not last long.
Call for your private inspection today! .

Description:
North Facing Sunny Home with 4 Bedrooms and 2 Renovated Bathrooms
Whether you’re just starting out or looking for your growing family this home is well worth the look. Comprising of four bedrooms, master with ensuite with the 4th bedroom potentially being utilized as a rumpus room, the floor plan is adaptable depending on your needs with the split level house showcasing two separate living zones plus dining and kitchen that overlook the child friendly and very usable back yard - it will make cooking and watching the kids a breeze. The updated bathrooms are a huge bonus along with the wood heater and ducted heating to keep you warm through the cooler months. Out side there is a big usable back yard ready for all the kids to play (even the big ones), a workshop with power, a large deck to the front of the house as well as sealed driveway and off-street parking and access up the side of the house to the rear yard. The large windows let the sun pour into this fantastic home that has family in mind even with its own little kids corner - it is ready for your family. So don’t delay, call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin 0412 996 609.

Description:
The one you've been waiting for!
This superb, new period styled home has been crafted with it's new owners in mind. It offers a low maintenance lifestyle whilst retaining the benefits of well established treed surrounds.
You are welcomed into the property with high ceilings and sophisticated color tones, offering spacious open plan living and all the comforts you would expect. Featuring three great sized bedrooms, master boasting full ensuite and walk in robe, robed secondary bedrooms and a beautifully appointed gloss white kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooks the living and dining zones, sliding doors open to reveal a decked outdoor sitting area that takes full advantage of the generous rear gardens (plenty of space for extra vehicles, future shedding etc.)
Located within a short stroll to Mountain Road reserve on a flat and private 895 sqm block. Double carport with access to the back yard, ducted heating throughout. Ready to move in and make your own!

Description:
ON TOP OF THE WORLD!
***OPEN CANCELLED - UNDER CONTRACT TILL 13/7/18***
Hidden away at the end of a no through road high on the hill this stunningly landscaped home is ready for you to move into and not do a thing. The home itself has been beautifully renovated with 2/3 good size bedrooms (one of which is accessed from outside), study nook, large laundry, open plan kitchen, central bathroom and a lounge that is warm and welcoming and opens out onto the undercover entertaining area. There is plenty of room for all the toys with an extra-large double garage with workshop plus an oversize double carport plus plenty of space to park with a turning circle and off street parking. The garden features steel retaining walls, tall hedges and soft and sweet garden beds complementing the house and with such a great outlook you can just sit back an enjoy in your own little piece of paradise. Under the house is another room that could be used for many different things or just gives you some extra storage. The sun filled block is ready and awaiting you but won’t be around long so book your inspection today! Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange your inspection today!

Description:
***CANCELLED - OPEN FOR INSPECTION - SATURDAY 12TH MAY - CANCELLED***
Flowing over three levels, this magical home has been designed to complement its peaceful surroundings and provides an immediate inner peace from the moment you enter. Soaring ceilings, floor to ceiling windows & chunky timbers create a vibrant yet soothing atmosphere throughout this home, which boasts four livings zones, master bedroom with retreat or possible ensuite/walk in robe area, an additional three bedrooms plus separate study. The central kitchen is light filled and features timber benches and stainless steel appliances. There are magnificent garden aspects from every window, of the serenity encapsulating this home. Set on 1/2 an acre, close to town, the local primary school, public transport, park, forest walks & sporting facilities, this home will capture your heart from the moment you see it.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Storybook Heaven & The Shed of Your Dreams
THIS IS NOT A MIRAGE!
Stop pinching yourself. This character 3 bed weatherboard cottage with mezzanine level & under house storage can be your own little oasis.
"The Cottage"
Enjoying a northerly aspect on a relatively flat plot of land you may find it hard to decide where to enjoy it from - there are so many places for quiet contemplation. Inside, the main open plan living incorporates a galley kitchen, meals space & cosy fire-side lounge. A mezzanine level above offers more living and an entirely gorgeous attic bedroom. 2 further bedrooms, a renovated bathroom with heated towel-rail, storage room & utility/laundry/pet space complete the set up of this well built, well maintained pocket rocket of a home.
"The Shed"
Now I, like the next lady, can get excited by a good shed but this is on another level. To fully comprehend this shed, I recommend looking at the floor plan. With concrete floors throughout, a single roller door and bifold doors open up the front for vehicle access into the automotive workshop. Barn doors lead into the metalwork space and at the rear a woodwork room with built-in cupboards, kitchenette & bathroom fitted out completely using recycled materials. There is also a spray booth.
"The Gardens"
This is an all seasons garden designed for "pottering" and includes Azaleas, Hakeas, Mini-Cogs, Roses & just wait for the spring bulbs to pop up. The front garden provides privacy from the road and can be enjoyed from the veranda. The fully landscaped rear garden leads you up the garden path, past a fish pond and over a creek and a look-a-like old mine shaft. Bird life can be spotted from the tranquil shed veranda or the outdoor entertaining deck.
Two driveways lead in to the property with space for vehicles behind the two sets of gates as well as in front.
Call Katie Woods for more info on 0428 744 498

Description:
WHO SAID YOU COULDN’T GET INTO THE PROPERTY MARKET?
Here is an ideal opportunity for you to get into the property market and secure your first home. Ideally situated in a no through road, you will enjoy the charm that only a home with high ceilings, exposed beams and timber linings can offer. Enjoy cosy evenings in front of the crackling wood fire or make the most of relaxed living in the warmer weather on the large covered decked area. There are 3 bedrooms, bathroom complete with bath and a functional kitchen that overlooks the rear yard. Set on a useable ¼ acre with enough room for outdoor activities as well as a double carport, this is a property that will suit those looking to add their own touches as well as investors and first home buyers. Sure to be popular, don’t hesitate to inspect this home.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
